attributes.action: Boycott Eurovision 2019 as we shouldn't endorse a country that kills civilians
attributes.additional_details: According to the UN Israel killed at least 1462 Palestinian civilians in 2014 alone. As Israel continues to take Palestinian land, more and more Palestinians are being forced out of their homes, or kept inside in Israeli imposed curfews. Water supplies and electricity are also cut off so Palestinians are kept in inhumane conditions
attributes.background: As Israel won the recent Eurovision song contest, they will host next year's competition. However, at the moment, Israel is embroiled in a war crimes investigation after its overly violent reaction to the recent protests by Palestinian civilians on the Gaza Strip
